63  void updateVelocities(double& trans_vel, double& rot_vel) {
64  trans_vel = moving_velocity;
65  rot_vel = turning_velocity;
66  // signal the GUI to update command's display
67  // low frequency and small data: no copy nor mutex needed!
68  commandsUpdated(trans_vel, rot_vel);
69  }
70 
71 public:
73  virtual ~Controller() {}
